document.full_text: just weeks after completing its $3.6 billion purchase of king pharmaceuticals, pfizer inc has recalled an opioid painkiller obtained in the deal and said it could remain unavailable for many months because of formulation problems.
document.title: pfizer recalls pain drug acquired in king deal
lines_and_colors: just weeks after completing its $3.6 billion purchase of king pharmaceuticals, pfizer inc has recalled an opioid painkiller obtained in the deal and said it could remain unavailable for many months because of formulation problems.
